targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "process_start_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Data Transferred in the time range

panels.description:
**Allocated:** The amount of memory Rclone is actually using.  
**Sys:** The amount of memory obtained from the OS.  
**Sys requested:** The amount of memory requested from the OS.
panels.title: Go Heap Memory Overview

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rclone_bytes_transferred_total" WITH KEY="url" WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Rclone
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rclone_bytes_transferred_total" WITH KEY="url" WHERE $timeFilter
